sqlMap.select:
SELECT MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, LAYOUT_SID layoutSid, PCODE pcode, PCODE2 pcode2, PCODE3 pcode3, PCODE4 pcode4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID menuContentsSid, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG menuLeftOutimg, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG menuLeftOverimg, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG menuLeftCurimg, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG menuLeftTopimg, MENU_INTRO_IMG menuIntroImg, MENU_TG menuTg, MENU_BOARD_GB menuBoardGb, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD menuBoardPeriod, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE menuSearchOffice, MENU_BOARD1_CATE menuBoard1Cate, MENU_BOARD2_CATE menuBoard2Cate, MENU_BOARD3_CATE menuBoard3Cate, MENU_ORDER_FIELD menuOrderField, MENU_ORDER_SORT menuOrderSort, BOARD_PCODE boardPcode, MENU_IS_SATIS menuIsSatis, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE menuIsBoard1Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE menuIsBoard2Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE menuIsBoard3Cate, MENU_BOARD_CEL menuBoardCel, MENU_BOARD_ROW menuBoardRow, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK menuBoardPageBlock, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE menuIsFix1Cate, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE menuIsFix2Cate, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE menuIsFix3Cate, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, (SELECT CONTENTS_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = A.MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsType, (SELECT CONTENTS_LINK_URL FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = A.MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsLinkUrl, sysdate contentsModiDate, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
MENU_IS_USE = '1' AND MENU_DP!=1
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNMENU
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
MENU_CD in ( $myMenuCdList$ )
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT $hintIndexStrs$ MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, LAYOUT_SID layoutSid, PCODE pcode, PCODE2 pcode2, PCODE3 pcode3, PCODE4 pcode4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID menuContentsSid, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG menuLeftOutimg, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG menuLeftOverimg, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG menuLeftCurimg, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG menuLeftTopimg, MENU_INTRO_IMG menuIntroImg, MENU_TG menuTg, MENU_BOARD_GB menuBoardGb, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD menuBoardPeriod, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE menuSearchOffice, MENU_BOARD1_CATE menuBoard1Cate, MENU_BOARD2_CATE menuBoard2Cate, MENU_BOARD3_CATE menuBoard3Cate, MENU_ORDER_FIELD menuOrderField, MENU_ORDER_SORT menuOrderSort, BOARD_PCODE boardPcode, MENU_IS_SATIS menuIsSatis, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE menuIsBoard1Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE menuIsBoard2Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE menuIsBoard3Cate, MENU_BOARD_CEL menuBoardCel, MENU_BOARD_ROW menuBoardRow, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK menuBoardPageBlock, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE menuIsFix1Cate, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE menuIsFix2Cate, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE menuIsFix3Cate, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, (SELECT CONTENTS_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsType, (SELECT CONTENTS_LINK_URL FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsLinkUrl, sysdate contentsModiDate, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
MENU_CD in ( $myMenuCdList$ )
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, LAYOUT_SID layoutSid, PCODE pcode, PCODE2 pcode2, PCODE3 pcode3, PCODE4 pcode4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID menuContentsSid, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG menuLeftOutimg, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, '' contentsType, '' contentsLinkUrl, (select CONTENTS_MODI_DATE from RFC_COMTNCONTENTS where contents_Sid =A.menu_Contents_Sid) contentsModiDate, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_NM = #menuNm#
$searchCondition$ LIKE '$searchKeyword$%'
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
MENU_SID = #menuSid#
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET
PCODE=#pcode# ,PCODE2=#pcode2# ,PCODE3=#pcode3# ,PCODE4=#pcode4# ,OFFICE_PT_SID=#officePtSid# ,OFFICE_PT_SID2=#officePtSid2# ,OFFICE_PT_SID3=#officePtSid3# ,OFFICE_PT_SID4=#officePtSid4# WHERE
MENU_CD=#menuCd#
MENU_SID=#menuSid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) cnt FROM RFC_COMTNMENU WHERE MENU_CD=#menuCd# AND PCODE=#pcode# AND OFFICE_PT_SID=#officePtSid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RFC_COMTNMENU ( MENU_SID, MENU_CD, MENU_NM, ENG_NAME, MENU_PARENT_CD, MENU_SORT_IX , MENU_IS_USE, MENU_DP, SGROUP_ID, DOMAIN_ID, OFFICE_NM, LAYOUT_SID, PCODE, PCODE2, PCODE3, PCODE4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG, MENU_INTRO_IMG , MENU_TG, MENU_BOARD_GB, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE, MENU_BOARD1_CATE, MENU_BOARD2_CATE, MENU_BOARD3_CATE, MENU_ORDER_FIELD, MENU_ORDER_SORT, BOARD_PCODE, MENU_IS_SATIS, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE, MENU_BOARD_CEL, MENU_BOARD_ROW, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY, CATEGORY_CODE1, CATEGORY_CODE2 , CATEGORY_CODE3 , MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT, MENU_TG_OPTION, OFFICE_PT_SID, OFFICE_PT_SID2, OFFICE_PT_SID3, OFFICE_PT_SID4, MENU_HELP, CATE_CD, CATE1_CD, CATE2_CD, CATE3_CD, SKIN_ID, MENU_IS_INDEX, CCL_IS_WRITER, CCL_IS_PAY, CCL_IS_MODIFY, OTHER_IS_BOARDID, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK, OFFICE_TEL, OFFICE_TEL_IS, TMP_FIELD1, TMP_FIELD2, TMP_FIELD3, TMP_FIELD4, TMP_FIELD5, TMP_FIELD6, TMP_FIELD7, TMP_FIELD8, TMP_FIELD9, TMP_FIELD10, TMP_FIELD11, TMP_FIELD12, TMP_FIELD13, TMP_FIELD14, TMP_FIELD15, TMP_FIELD16, TMP_FIELD17, TMP_FIELD18, TMP_FIELD19, TMP_FIELD20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL ) VALUES ( #menuSid#, #menuCd#, #menuNm#, #engName#, #menuParentCd#, #menuSortIx#, #menuIsUse#, #menuDp#, #sgroupId#, #domainId#, #officeNm#, $layoutSid$, #pcode#, #pcode2#, #pcode3#, #pcode4#, $menuContentsSid$, #menuLeftOutimg#, #menuLeftOverimg#, #menuLeftCurimg#, #menuLeftTopimg#, #menuIntroImg#, #menuTg#, #menuBoardGb#, #menuBoardPeriod#, #menuSearchOffice#, #menuBoard1Cate#, #menuBoard2Cate#, #menuBoard3Cate#, #menuOrderField#, #menuOrderSort#, #boardPcode#, #menuIsSatis#, #menuIsBoard1Cate#, #menuIsBoard2Cate#, #menuIsBoard3Cate#, #menuBoardCel#, #menuBoardRow#, #menuBoardPageBlock#, #menuIsFix1Cate#, #menuIsFix2Cate#, #menuIsFix3Cate#, #menuIsReturnPage#, #menuLoginApply#, #menuIsSkinApply#, #categoryCode1#, #categoryCode2#, #categoryCode3#, #menuIsLeftPrint#, #menuTgOption#, #officePtSid#, #officePtSid2#, #officePtSid3#, #officePtSid4#, #menuHelp#, #cateCd#, #cate1Cd#, #cate2Cd#, #cate3Cd#, #skinId#, #menuIsIndex#, #cclIsWriter#, #cclIsPay#, #cclIsModify#, #otherIsBoardId#, #customerAdminView#, #menuSearchOfficeCheck#, #officeTel#, #officeTelIs#, #tmpField1#, #tmpField2#, #tmpField3#, #tmpField4#, #tmpField5#, #tmpField6#, #tmpField7#, #tmpField8#, #tmpField9#, #tmpField10#, #tmpField11#, #tmpField12#, #tmpField13#, #tmpField14#, #tmpField15#, #tmpField16#, #tmpField17#, #tmpField18#, #tmpField19#, #tmpField20#, #searchTagrgetFL# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNMENU WHERE MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET MENU_NM = #menuNm#, ENG_NAME = #engName#, MENU_SORT_IX = #menuSortIx#, MENU_IS_USE = #menuIsUse#, MENU_DP = #menuDp#, OFFICE_NM = #officeNm#, LAYOUT_SID = #layoutSid#, PCODE = #pcode#, PCODE2 = #pcode2#, PCODE3 = #pcode3#, PCODE4 = #pcode4#, MENU_CONTENTS_SID = #menuContentsSid#, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG = #menuLeftOutimg#, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG = #menuLeftOverimg#, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG = #menuLeftCurimg#, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG = #menuLeftTopimg#, MENU_INTRO_IMG = #menuIntroImg#, MENU_TG = #menuTg#, MENU_BOARD_GB = #menuBoardGb#, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD = #menuBoardPeriod#, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE = #menuSearchOffice#, MENU_BOARD1_CATE = #menuBoard1Cate#, MENU_BOARD2_CATE = #menuBoard2Cate#, MENU_BOARD3_CATE = #menuBoard3Cate#, MENU_ORDER_FIELD = #menuOrderField#, MENU_ORDER_SORT = #menuOrderSort#, BOARD_PCODE = #boardPcode#, MENU_IS_SATIS = #menuIsSatis#, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE = #menuIsBoard1Cate#, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE = #menuIsBoard2Cate#, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE = #menuIsBoard3Cate#, MENU_BOARD_CEL = #menuBoardCel#, MENU_BOARD_ROW = #menuBoardRow#, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK = #menuBoardPageBlock#, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE = #menuIsFix1Cate#, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE = #menuIsFix2Cate#, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE = #menuIsFix3Cate#, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE = #menuIsReturnPage#, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = #menuLoginApply#, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY = #menuIsSkinApply#, CATEGORY_CODE1 = #categoryCode1#, CATEGORY_CODE2 = #categoryCode2#, CATEGORY_CODE3 = #categoryCode3#, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT =#menuIsLeftPrint#, MENU_TG_OPTION =#menuTgOption#, OFFICE_PT_SID =#officePtSid#, OFFICE_PT_SID2 =#officePtSid2#, OFFICE_PT_SID3 =#officePtSid3#, OFFICE_PT_SID4 =#officePtSid4#, MENU_HELP =#menuHelp#, CATE_CD =#cateCd#, CATE1_CD =#cate1Cd#, CATE2_CD =#cate2Cd#, CATE3_CD =#cate3Cd#, SKIN_ID =#skinId#, MENU_IS_INDEX =#menuIsIndex#, CCL_IS_WRITER =#cclIsWriter#, CCL_IS_PAY =#cclIsPay#, CCL_IS_MODIFY =#cclIsModify#, OTHER_IS_BOARDID =#otherIsBoardId#, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW =#customerAdminView#, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK =#menuSearchOfficeCheck#, OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#, OFFICE_TEL_IS=#officeTelIs#, TMP_FIELD1 =#tmpField1#, TMP_FIELD2 =#tmpField2#, TMP_FIELD3 =#tmpField3#, TMP_FIELD4 =#tmpField4#, TMP_FIELD5 =#tmpField5#, TMP_FIELD6 =#tmpField6#, TMP_FIELD7 =#tmpField7#, TMP_FIELD8 =#tmpField8#, TMP_FIELD9 =#tmpField9#, TMP_FIELD10 =#tmpField10#, TMP_FIELD11 =#tmpField11#, TMP_FIELD12 =#tmpField12#, TMP_FIELD13 =#tmpField13#, TMP_FIELD14 =#tmpField14#, TMP_FIELD15 =#tmpField15#, TMP_FIELD16 =#tmpField16#, TMP_FIELD17 =#tmpField17#, TMP_FIELD18 =#tmpField18#, TMP_FIELD19 =#tmpField19#, TMP_FIELD20 =#tmpField20#, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL=#searchTagrgetFL# WHERE MENU_SID=#menuSid#

SELECT $hintIndexStrs$ MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, LAYOUT_SID layoutSid, PCODE pcode, PCODE2 pcode2, PCODE3 pcode3, PCODE4 pcode4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID menuContentsSid, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG menuLeftOutimg, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG menuLeftOverimg, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG menuLeftCurimg, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG menuLeftTopimg, MENU_INTRO_IMG menuIntroImg, MENU_TG menuTg, MENU_BOARD_GB menuBoardGb, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD menuBoardPeriod, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE menuSearchOffice, MENU_BOARD1_CATE menuBoard1Cate, MENU_BOARD2_CATE menuBoard2Cate, MENU_BOARD3_CATE menuBoard3Cate, MENU_ORDER_FIELD menuOrderField, MENU_ORDER_SORT menuOrderSort, BOARD_PCODE boardPcode, MENU_IS_SATIS menuIsSatis, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE menuIsBoard1Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE menuIsBoard2Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE menuIsBoard3Cate, MENU_BOARD_CEL menuBoardCel, MENU_BOARD_ROW menuBoardRow, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK menuBoardPageBlock, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE menuIsFix1Cate, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE menuIsFix2Cate, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE menuIsFix3Cate, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, '' contentsType, '' contentsLinkUrl, sysdate contentsModiDate, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL
FROM RFC_COMTNMENU WHERE
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
AND DOMAIN_ID = #domainId# AND MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
ORDER BY MENU_SORT_IX ASC,MENU_CD ASC

select MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, (select CONTENTS_TYPE from RFC_COMTNCONTENTS where CONTENTS_SID = t.menu_Contents_Sid) contentsType, (select CONTENTS_LINK_URL from RFC_COMTNCONTENTS where CONTENTS_SID =t.menu_Contents_Sid) contentsLinkUrl, (select CONTENTS_MODI_DATE from RFC_COMTNCONTENTS where contents_Sid =t.menu_Contents_Sid) contentsModiDate, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL
from RFC_COMTNMENU t WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
ORDER BY MENU_SORT_IX ASC,MENU_CD ASC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET
PCODE=#pcode#, PCODE2=#pcode2#, PCODE3=#pcode3#, PCODE4=#pcode4#, OFFICE_PT_SID=#officePtSid#, OFFICE_PT_SID2=#officePtSid2#, OFFICE_PT_SID3=#officePtSid3#, OFFICE_PT_SID4=#officePtSid4# WHERE MENU_SID=#menuSid#
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET MENU_CONTENTS_SID = 0 WHERE MENU_CONTENTS_SID=#menuContentsSid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_NM menuNm, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd FROM RFC_COMTNMENU WHERE MENU_CD = #menuParentCd# AND MENU_IS_USE = '1'

SELECT menuCd FROM ( SELECT ALL_LIST.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MENU_CD menuCd FROM RFC_COMTNMENU A WHERE MENU_CONTENTS_SID = #menuContentsSid# AND MENU_IS_USE = '1' ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > 0 AND RNUM <= 1

MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
MENU_PARENT_CD = '0' AND MENU_CD LIKE '$menuParentCd$%'
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
AND ( MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = 'all' OR MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = '' OR MENU_LOGIN_APPLY is null
MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = #menuLoginApply#
)
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$

MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE menuIsFix2Cate, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE menuIsFix3Cate, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU WHERE MENU_IS_USE =1
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
ORDER BY MENU_CD ASC, MENU_SORT_IX ASC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET PCODE = #pcode#, PCODE2 = #pcode2#, PCODE3 = #pcode3#, PCODE4 = #pcode4#, OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid#, OFFICE_PT_SID2 = #officePtSid2#, OFFICE_PT_SID3 = #officePtSid3#, OFFICE_PT_SID4 = #officePtSid4#
WHERE MENU_SID=#menuSid#

menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
MENU_CD in ( $myMenuCdList$ )
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
MENU_IS_USE = '1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET PCODE = #pcode#, OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid# WHERE MENU_CD=#menuCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT MENU_SID menuSid, MENU_CD menuCd, MENU_NM menuNm, ENG_NAME engName, MENU_PARENT_CD menuParentCd, MENU_SORT_IX menuSortIx, MENU_IS_USE menuIsUse, MENU_DP menuDp, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, OFFICE_NM officeNm, LAYOUT_SID layoutSid, PCODE pcode, PCODE2 pcode2, PCODE3 pcode3, PCODE4 pcode4, MENU_CONTENTS_SID menuContentsSid, MENU_LEFT_OUTIMG menuLeftOutimg, MENU_LEFT_OVERIMG menuLeftOverimg, MENU_LEFT_CURIMG menuLeftCurimg, MENU_LEFT_TOPIMG menuLeftTopimg, MENU_INTRO_IMG menuIntroImg, MENU_TG menuTg, MENU_BOARD_GB menuBoardGb, MENU_BOARD_PERIOD menuBoardPeriod, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICE menuSearchOffice, MENU_BOARD1_CATE menuBoard1Cate, MENU_BOARD2_CATE menuBoard2Cate, MENU_BOARD3_CATE menuBoard3Cate, MENU_ORDER_FIELD menuOrderField, MENU_ORDER_SORT menuOrderSort, BOARD_PCODE boardPcode, MENU_IS_SATIS menuIsSatis, MENU_IS_BOARD1_CATE menuIsBoard1Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD2_CATE menuIsBoard2Cate, MENU_IS_BOARD3_CATE menuIsBoard3Cate, MENU_BOARD_CEL menuBoardCel, MENU_BOARD_ROW menuBoardRow, MENU_BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK menuBoardPageBlock, MENU_IS_FIX1_CATE menuIsFix1Cate, MENU_IS_FIX2_CATE menuIsFix2Cate, MENU_IS_FIX3_CATE menuIsFix3Cate, MENU_IS_RETURN_PAGE menuIsReturnPage, MENU_LOGIN_APPLY menuLoginApply, MENU_IS_SKIN_APPLY menuIsSkinApply , CATEGORY_CODE1 categoryCode1, CATEGORY_CODE2 categoryCode2, CATEGORY_CODE3 categoryCode3, MENU_IS_LEFT_PRINT menuIsLeftPrint, MENU_TG_OPTION menuTgOption, OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, OFFICE_PT_SID2 officePtSid2, OFFICE_PT_SID3 officePtSid3, OFFICE_PT_SID4 officePtSid4, MENU_HELP menuHelp, CATE_CD cateCd, CATE1_CD cate1Cd, CATE2_CD cate2Cd, CATE3_CD cate3Cd, (SELECT CONTENTS_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = A.MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsType, (SELECT CONTENTS_LINK_URL FROM RFC_COMTNCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_SID = A.MENU_CONTENTS_SID ) contentsLinkUrl, sysdate contentsModiDate, SKIN_ID skinId, MENU_IS_INDEX menuIsIndex, CCL_IS_WRITER cclIsWriter, CCL_IS_PAY cclIsPay, CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, TMP_FIELD1 tmpField1, TMP_FIELD2 tmpField2, TMP_FIELD3 tmpField3, TMP_FIELD4 tmpField4, TMP_FIELD5 tmpField5, TMP_FIELD6 tmpField6, TMP_FIELD7 tmpField7, TMP_FIELD8 tmpField8, TMP_FIELD9 tmpField9, TMP_FIELD10 tmpField10, TMP_FIELD11 tmpField11, TMP_FIELD12 tmpField12, TMP_FIELD13 tmpField13, TMP_FIELD14 tmpField14, TMP_FIELD15 tmpField15, TMP_FIELD16 tmpField16, TMP_FIELD17 tmpField17, TMP_FIELD18 tmpField18, TMP_FIELD19 tmpField19, TMP_FIELD20 tmpField20, SEARCH_TAGRGET_FL searchTagrgetFL FROM RFC_COMTNMENU A WHERE 1=1
MENU_CD = #menuCd#
MENU_DP = #menuDp#
MENU_PARENT_CD = #menuParentCd#
MENU_PARENT_CD = '0' AND MENU_CD LIKE '$menuParentCd$%'
AND ( MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = 'all' OR MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = '' OR MENU_LOGIN_APPLY is null
MENU_LOGIN_APPLY = #menuLoginApply#
)
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$

CCL_IS_MODIFY cclIsModify, OTHER_IS_BOARDID otherIsBoardId, CUSTOMER_ADMIN_VIEW customerAdminView, MENU_SEARCH_OFFICECHECK menuSearchOfficeCheck, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_TEL_IS officeTelIs, #menuCdList[]#

sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMENU SET
PCODE=#pcode#,
PCODE2=#pcode2#,
PCODE3=#pcode3#,
PCODE4=#pcode4#,
OFFICE_PT_SID=#officePtSid#
OFFICE_PT_SID2=#officePtSid2#
OFFICE_PT_SID3=#officePtSid3#
OFFICE_PT_SID4=#officePtSid4#
WHERE MENU_CD=#menuCd#
